title: Be part of the Chelsea Women family !
body_text:
Be part of the Chelsea Women family!
Chelsea FC Women at Stamford Bridge is an incredible experience you just have to live for yourself! And with a European classic just around the corner, you have that chance!
It was a memorable night at Stamford Bridge last Friday as Chelsea Women secured a 3-1 win over London rivals Arsenal during a feast of football action in SW6.
The biggest home attendance in Chelsea Womens history saw goals from Lauren James and Sjoeke Nusken earn the Blues three points in the dramatic race at the top of the Womens Super League.
Then, we followed that up with a stunning 3-0 win over Ajax in Amsterdam in the first leg of our Womens Champions League quarter-final tie - with the return leg your chance to see the Blues in action at Stamford Bridge!
Well be back at the Bridge on Wednesday 27 March for the second leg and you can secure your seat by clicking HERE!
To get you in the mood, here is our fan-focused gallery from an excellent night against the Gunners. What are you waiting for? Be part of the Chelsea Women family!
( Press Release Image: https://photos.webwire.com/prmedia/8/319562/319562-1.jpg )
